Title: Back to the Future Part III
Overview: The final installment of the Back to the Future trilogy finds Marty digging the trusty DeLorean out of a mineshaft and looking for Doc in the Wild West of 1885. But when their time machine breaks down, the travelers are stranded in a land of spurs. More problems arise when Doc falls for pretty schoolteacher Clara Clayton, and Marty tangles with Buford Tannen.
Tagline: They've saved the best trip for last... But this time they may have gone too far.
Keywords: railroad robber, california, delorean, indian territory, sports car, inventor, locomotive, saloon, horseback riding, time travel, outlaw, sequel, mad scientist, native american, western, shootout, gunfight, train, wild west, cavalry
production_companies: Universal Pictures, Amblin Entertainment, U-Drive Productions
Cast: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Mary Steenburgen
